TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OutputCacheProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class OutputCacheProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: Serves as a base class that contains abstract methods for implementing an output-cache provider.

span.span: Serves as a base class that contains abstract methods for implementing an output-cache provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的輸出快取提供者必須實作中的抽象方法類別。All output-cache providers must implement the abstract methods in the class.

span.para:
當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員:-
-
-
-

When you inherit from , you must override the following members: -
-
-
-

Public MustOverride Function Add (key As String, entry As Object, utcExpiry As DateTime) As Object

abstract member Add : string * obj * DateTime -> obj

param.span: The content to add to the output cache.

span.span: The content to add to the output cache.

param.name: utcExpiry
param.span: The time and date on which the cached entry expires.

summary.span: Inserts the specified entry into the output cache.

span.span: Inserts the specified entry into the output cache.

returns.span: A reference to the specified provider.

span.span: A reference to the specified provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的索引鍵的快取中已經有一個值，該值必須傳回提供者。If there is already a value in the cache for the specified key, the provider must return that value. 提供者必須儲存資料要傳遞使用方法參數。The provider must not store the data passed by using the method parameters. 方法儲存的資料，如果它已經不在快取中。The method stores the data if it is not already in the cache. 如果資料快取中，方法會傳回它。If the data is in the cache, the method returns it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的到期日期`utcExpiry`永遠是絕對到期日。The expiration date specified in `utcExpiry` is always an absolute expiration date.
